description.narrative: This proposed preparatory study is a collaboration between IMCC Ashipti and HFFG The overall aim of the study is to create a solid foundation for future projects by investigating the local context and identify the main problems related to NCDs and risk factors among the target group With this preparatory- study we want to investigate the focus on the lifestyle changes that can reduce the incidence of NCDs, and on the basis of this, we will collaboratively come up with new, innovative approaches to working with preventing NCDs in order to create sustainable change and long-term impact in the local communities As a result of this, we will discuss concrete project ideas and agree upon a time frame for our next project In order to achieve this purpose, we will make a needs assessment of the target group, visit stakeholders and finally conduct workshops internally in order to improve the organizations? capacity and organizational sustainability
